alkosh.name: Roar of Alkosh
alkosh.description: Set from Maw of Lorkhaj, deals damage and reduces resistance on synergy
alkosh.usage: Best on DD, because scales of wpd. Activate a synergy to deal moderate damage and reduce resistance for up to 6000 points

master-architect.name: Master Architect
master-architect.description: Set from Halls of Fabrication, gives Major Slayer for ultimate spent
master-architect.usage: Gain as much ultimate points as possible and use it. Each 10 points give 1 second of Major Slayer

war-machine.name: War Machine
war-machine.description: Set from Halls of Fabrication, gives Major Slayer for ultimate spent
war-machine.usage: Gain as much ultimate points as possible and use it. Each 10 points give 1 second of Major Slayer

relequen.name: Arms of Relequen
relequen.description: Set from Cloudrest, applies Harmful Winds damaging debuff
relequen.usage: Apply and maintain 10 stacks of winds to get max damage from set

siroria.name: Mantle of Siroria
siroria.description: Set from Cloudrest, creates an aura around you, where you getting Siroria's Boon stacks
siroria.usage: Standing in the aura gives you stacks on LA, so for best performance you have to stay in this aura and maintain 10 stacks

olorime.name: Vestment of Olorime
olorime.description: Set from Cloudrest, creates an aura around AoE cast, granting your teammates Major Courage for 20 seconds
olorime.usage: Standing in the aura gives your teammates Major Courage. No one have to stay in aura, effect applies and is active for 20 seconds

galenwe.name: Aegis of Galenwe
galenwe.description: Set from Cloudrest, gives Empower to your allies when you block
galenwe.usage: When you block, you grant Empower increasing Heavy-attack damage by 80% for your team

yandir.name: Yandir's Might
yandir.description: Set from Kyne's Aegis, stacks <> buff on you
yandir.usage: Gain and maintain 10 stacks of might ato get max damage. In case you need burst damage - you can heavy-attack to increase damage, but stacks will be lost

bahsei.name: Bahsei's Mania
bahsei.description: Set from Rockgrove, increases damage as your Magicka falls down
bahsei.usage: As soon as your magicka falls, damage is increased. This works up to 15% - so for max damage your magicka should be below 15%

sul-xan.name: Sul-Xan's Torment
sul-xan.description: Set from Rockgrove, increases crit chance and crit damage wen touching the soul
sul-xan.usage: When an enemy dies, he leaves the soul for 6 seconds. Touch it and you'll be granted Critical Chance and Critical damage increase for 30 seconds

saxhleel.name: Saxhleel Champion
saxhleel.description: Set from Rockgrove, gives the group Major Force buff on any ultimate usage
saxhleel.usage: Gain as much Ultimate points as possible, then use ultimate. Each 15 points spent give 1 second of Major Force (basically war horn)

stone-talker.name: Stone-Talker's Oath
stone-talker.description: Set from Rockgrove, restores resources on heavy attack
stone-talker.usage: Perform a heavy attack to cause a bomb explosion. 5% of damage dealt will be restored as primary resource for each teammate

coral.name: Coral Riptide
coral.description: Set from Dreadsail Reef, increases damage as your Stamina falls down
coral.usage: As soon as your stamina falls, damage is increased. This works up to 33% - so for max damage your stamina should be below 33%

depth.name: Whorl of the Depth
depth.description: Set from Dreadsail Reef, creates a whorl under the target which gives AoE Frost damage
depth.usage: Can be backbarred. Applies DoT after crit damage, then creates an AoE 8 seconds later. Procs every 18 seconds

pillager.name: Pillager's Profit
pillager.description: Set from Dreadsail Reef, restores 5% of ultimate spent for each ally
pillager.usage: Gain as much ultimate points as possible and use it. 5% of points spent will be restored for each ally within 10 seconds

pearl.name: Pearlescent Ward
pearl.description: Set from Dreadsail Reef, increases spd/wpd for each ally alive, increases damage reduction for each ally dead
pearl.usage: Just wear it. When no players die, group gets up to 180 spd/wpd. When people die, damage reduction is increased
